STORYTELLER_ADDON_SINGLE.Settings.DontOp: Check to prevent single sheet images from opening on user click. Default: true
STORYTELLER_ADDON_SINGLE.Settings.ImageB: Should image pages in singlesheets have a page background (uncheck to remove page background). Note that other pages in the stack (pages of the same journal entry) may be seen behind if the image is not the only page of the journal.
